definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Dian4 hua4 Dian4 bao4 Gong1 si1

definition: neighborhood telephone, with sb in charge of notifying others when they receive a call

pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Dian4 bao4 Dian4 hua4 Gong1 si1
gong1 gong4 jiao1 huan4 dian4 hua4 wang3 lu4
gong1 yong4 jiao1 huan4 dian4 hua4 wang3

sentences.english: I hadn't paid the telephone bill.
This was the call Susan worked so hard to receive.
sentences.chinese: 這個電話對蘇珊來說是得之不易的。

sentences.english: Linda phoned me in on arrival so that I know she was safe and sound.
sentences.chinese: 琳達到達後給我打了電話，因而我知道她平安無事。

sentences.english: This is the charge for your IDD calls.
The big black Bakelite phone rang at half past ten.
sentences.chinese: 十點半的時候，外殼用膠木做的電話響了。

sentences.english: By the way, the number of the telephone on your desk is extension 506.
sentences.chinese: 順便說一下，你桌上的電話號碼是分機506。
老百姓都稱其爲“骨架電話機”。

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移動電話已經使發展中國家跨越了固話網絡這個階段。

sentences.english: When I was doing the housework, my husband telephoned me from the office.
sentences.chinese: 當我正在幹家務時，我丈夫從辦公室打電話給我。

sentences.english: Give them a call and hang out sometime.
sentences.chinese: 給他們打個電話，約個時間出去逛逛吧。

sentences.english: She said to call a week to three days before leaving.
sentences.chinese: 請在您要離開前三至七天左右再打電話過來。

sentences.english: Next time have her telephone you.
sentences.chinese: 下一次叫她給你打磙電話。

sentences.english: I'll call right now to find it out.
Sorry, it's our house phone, not for outside line.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，這是工作電話，不外借。

sentences.english: I just received a terribly grhvacious cisl from Sen. McCain.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛，麥凱恩參議員很有風範地給我打了個電話。

sentences.english: If I overslept because I am ill, I always call in absent to work –
sentences.chinese: 如果我睡過頭是因爲我生病了，我總會打電話請假。

definition: to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to hold a conversation/to talk over the telephone/phone call
to press charges/to file a complaint
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
